Harriet Arline Forte Kennedy (November 22, 1931 na February 12, 1994) bụ ónyé nchịkwa ebe ngosi nka America, ónyé na-ese ihe, na ónyé na-agụ egwu.

A mụrụ ya na Cambridge, Massachusetts, Kennedy gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'ógbè ahụ tupu ọ gaa Massachusetts College of Art, Institute of Art Administration na Mahadum Harvard, na Mahaduma Northeastern, ébé ọ nwetara nzèrè bachelọ. Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na School of the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston site na 1960 ruo 1965, wee malite ọmụmụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Boston na 1965.
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Museum of Fine Arts, Boston tupu ọ bụrụ osote ónyé nduzi nke Museum of Afro-American Artists. Kennedy bụkwa ónyé coloratura soprano nke na-abụ abụ n'ebe niile na mpaghara Boston.
Kennedy nwụrụ na Medford, Massachusetts n'afọ 1994
O nwèrè ụmụ atọ, gụnyere nwa nwanyị nkuchi.
